text: "Talking in Your Sleep" is a 1978 originally recorded by the band Marmalade and failed to chart. The Crystal Gayle version was the most successful recorded and is the leading single from her fifth studio album When I Dream. It went to number 18 in the United States, number 11 in the United Kingdom and Canada and number 5 in Ireland. It topped the country single charts in the United States and Canada. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:Country pop songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Crystal Gayle songs Category:Cilla Black songs Category:Martine McCutcheon songs Category:Reba McEntire songs
title: Talking in Your Sleep (Crystal Gayle song)
